name: SLAP FIGHT!
description:
WELCOME TO SLAP FIGHT!

Slap your way through 10 opponents to see who the best slap fighter is!

How to play

===========

Approach a fighter and press E to challenge them. 

When the fight begins, start smashing the button that appears above the fight bar.

the fighter who slaps the fastest wins!

After winning, proceed to the next room.

CONTROLS

============

WASD : walk / convo interaction / fight

SPACE: Jump / convo accept

E: Interact

OTHER INFO

==========

This game was developed in 48 hours for ShenaniJam 2017.

Game by: zeoxo

Music by: OOEY GOOEY
